headline: Strategic splurging maximizes impact on safari experience
summary: When allocating a safari splurge budget, prioritize in this order: guide quality (private vehicle with excellent guide), location (inside park or prime conservancy), and finally accommodation luxury. A skilled guide in a basic camp creates better memories than average guiding at a luxury lodge. If upgrading accommodation, invest in one exceptional property rather than spreading across all nights.

assumptions.text: Exceptional guides transform safaris more than any other factor.
Being in the right place at dawn/dusk matters more than room thread count.
One memorable luxury experience often creates better trip narrative than distributed upgrades.

gains: Better value than spreading budget thin
losses: Requires research to identify where to splurge
Premium for top guides not always transparent

change_conditions: If honeymoon or celebration, consistent luxury level may matter more.
If wildlife is secondary to relaxation, accommodation quality takes priority.
If you've done multiple safaris, you may value exclusive camps over guiding.
If photography-focused, invest in vehicle positioning over room quality.
